wxIFMCaptionConfig Class Reference

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Config data for caption appearance.

See also:
IFM_CAPTION_STYLES

Member Function Documentation

const wxColour & wxIFMCaptionConfig::get_caption_color (   )  const
 

Returns the background color used to draw the caption. If the caption has the IFM_CAPTION_GRADIENT style, this color will be used for the start of the gradient.

Returns:
The background color used for captions

const wxColour & wxIFMCaptionConfig::get_caption_gradient_color (   )  const
 

Returns the background color used as the end gradient color if the caption has the IFM_CAPTION_GRADIENT style. If it does not have this style, this color is ignored.

Returns:
The background color used for the end of the gradient.

int wxIFMCaptionConfig::get_caption_style (   )  const
 

Returns:
The style of the caption.

const wxFont & wxIFMCaptionConfig::get_font (   )  const
 

Returns:
The font used to render caption text

const wxColour & wxIFMCaptionConfig::get_font_colour (   )  const
 

Returns:
The color used to render caption text

void wxIFMCaptionConfig::set_caption_color (  const wxColour &  colour  ) 
 

Sets the background color used to draw the caption. If the caption has the IFM_CAPTION_GRADIENT style, this color will be used for the start of the gradient.

void wxIFMCaptionConfig::set_caption_gradient_color (  const wxColour &  colour  ) 
 

Sets the background color used as the end gradient color.

void wxIFMCaptionConfig::set_caption_style (  int  style  ) 
 

Sets the caption style. The style of the caption changes its appearance

void wxIFMCaptionConfig::set_font (  const wxFont &  font  ) 
 

Sets the font used to render caption text. This also calculates the padding values and the final caption height, which is based on the height of the caption font

void wxIFMCaptionConfig::set_font_colour (  const wxColour &  colour  ) 
 

Sets the color used to render caption text
